abstracts.cdata!:
The Management Response to the
            Invetigation Report for the Arun III Hydroelectric PRoject
            in Nepal summarizes the findings of the Inspection
            Panel's investigation into alleged non-compliance by
            IDA with its Operational Directives on environmental
            assessment, on indigenous peoples, and on involuntary
            resettlement during the preparation and appraisal of the
            Arun Hydroelectric Project. This Management Report examines
            all of the claims made by the Requestors, and the
            Investigation findings of the claims. The Inspectors'
            findings are reflected in this report. The investigation was
            conducted in two phases. In first phase the Inspectors
            interviewed staff and consultants and conducted a desk study
            in Washington. During the second phase the Inspectors
            carried out a field inspection in Nepal. The summary
            provided, shows the Requestors claims followed by actual
            finding from the Investigation. Annex 1 shows a comparison
            between the hill and valley access road. Annex 2 examines
            data about the acquisition, compensation and rehabilitation
            along the hill route.
